title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.28 - Proof of transfer with engagements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.28 - Proof of transfer with engagements

State Regulations

Whenever the ownership of a horse is transferred in any
manner, all racing engagements of the said horse shall automatically accompany
the transfer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4025.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
